00086  struct ZIP_API CInfo
00087  {
00088   
00093   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE   m_uEndOffset;
00094 
00099   ZIP_VOLUME_TYPE m_uLastVolume;
00100   ZIP_VOLUME_TYPE m_uVolumeWithCD;  
00101   ZIP_INDEX_TYPE m_uVolumeEntriesNo; 
00102   ZIP_INDEX_TYPE m_uEntriesNumber; 
00103 
00108   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE m_uSize;
00109 
00115   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE m_uOffset;
00116 
00117 
00121   bool m_bInArchive;
00122 
00123  private:
00124   friend class CZipCentralDir;  
00125   void Init()
00126   {
00127    m_iReference = 1;
00128 #ifdef ZIP_ARCHIVE_USE_LOCKING
00129    m_mutex.Open();
00130 #endif
00131    m_pCompare = GetCZipStrCompFunc(ZipPlatform::GetSystemCaseSensitivity());
00132    m_bCaseSensitive = false;
00133    m_bFindFastEnabled = false;
00134    m_pszComment.Release();
00135    // initialize ( necessary when using 64 bits - we are copying only 4 bytes in Read()) 
00136    m_bInArchive = false;
00137    m_uEndOffset = 0;
00138    m_uLastVolume = 0;
00139    m_uVolumeWithCD = 0;
00140    m_uVolumeEntriesNo = 0;
00141    m_uEntriesNumber = 0;
00142    m_uSize = 0;  
00143    m_uOffset = 0;
00144   }
00145   bool CheckIfOK_1()
00146   {
00147    return (m_uEndOffset >= m_uOffset + m_uSize);
00148   }
00149   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE CalculateBytesBeforeZip()
00150   {
00151    return m_uEndOffset - m_uSize - m_uOffset;
00152   }
00153   bool CheckIfOK_2()
00154   {
00155    return (m_uSize || !m_uEntriesNumber) && (m_uEntriesNumber || !m_uSize);
00156   }
00157   void DiskChange(ZIP_VOLUME_TYPE uCurrentVolume)
00158   {
00159    m_uLastVolume = uCurrentVolume;
00160    if (m_uEntriesNumber)
00161    {
00162     m_uVolumeEntriesNo = 0; 
00163    }
00164    else
00165    {
00166     m_uVolumeWithCD = m_uLastVolume;
00167     m_uOffset = 0;
00168    }
00169   }
00170   
00180   bool NeedsZip64() const
00181   {
00182    return m_uLastVolume >= USHRT_MAX || m_uVolumeWithCD >= USHRT_MAX || m_uVolumeEntriesNo >= USHRT_MAX || m_uEntriesNumber >= USHRT_MAX || m_uSize >= UINT_MAX || m_uOffset >= UINT_MAX;
00183   }
00184 
00185   CZipAutoBuffer m_pszComment; 
00186 
00190   bool m_bCaseSensitive;
00191 
00195   bool m_bFindFastEnabled; 
00196 
00197  private:
00201   ZIPSTRINGCOMPARE m_pCompare;
00202   int m_iReference;
00203 #ifdef ZIP_ARCHIVE_USE_LOCKING
00204   ZipArchiveLib::CZipMutex m_mutex;
00205 #endif
00206  };

00411  ZIP_INDEX_TYPE GetFindFastIndex(ZIP_INDEX_TYPE uFindFastIndex)const
00412  {
00413   if (!IsValidIndex(uFindFastIndex) || !m_pInfo->m_bFindFastEnabled)
00414    return ZIP_FILE_INDEX_NOT_FOUND;
00415   
00416   return (*m_pFindArray)[(ZIP_ARRAY_SIZE_TYPE)uFindFastIndex]->m_uIndex;
00417  }

00571  
00575  static int CompareHeaders(const void *pArg1, const void *pArg2)
00576  {
00577   CZipFileHeader* pw1 = *(CZipFileHeader**)pArg1;
00578   CZipFileHeader* pw2 = *(CZipFileHeader**)pArg2;
00579   if (pw1 == pw2)
00580    return 0;
00581 
00582   if (pw1->m_uVolumeStart == pw2->m_uVolumeStart)
00583   {
00584    if (pw1->m_uOffset < pw2->m_uOffset)
00585     return -1;
00586    else if (pw1->m_uOffset > pw2->m_uOffset)
00587     return 1;
00588     ASSERT(FALSE);
00589 
00590 
00591    // two files with the same offsets in the same volume???
00592    CZipException::Throw(CZipException::badZipFile);
00593    return 0; // just for the compiler comfort (and discomfort of another)
00594   }
00595   else if (pw1->m_uVolumeStart < pw2->m_uVolumeStart)
00596    return -1;
00597   else // if (pw1->m_uVolumeStart > pw2->m_uVolumeStart)
00598    return 1;  
00599  }
00600 
00601 #if _MSC_VER > 1000
00602  #pragma warning( pop )
00603 #endif
00604 
00605  static int CompareFindFastCollate(const void* pArg1, const void* pArg2)
00606  {
00607   CZipFindFast* pHeader1 = *(CZipFindFast**)pArg1;
00608   CZipFindFast* pHeader2 = *(CZipFindFast**)pArg2;  
00609   return pHeader1->m_pHeader->GetFileName().Collate(pHeader2->m_pHeader->GetFileName());
00610  }
00611 
00612  static int CompareFindFastCollateNoCase(const void* pArg1, const void* pArg2)
00613  {
00614   CZipFindFast* pHeader1 = *(CZipFindFast**)pArg1;
00615   CZipFindFast* pHeader2 = *(CZipFindFast**)pArg2;  
00616   return pHeader1->m_pHeader->GetFileName().CollateNoCase(pHeader2->m_pHeader->GetFileName());
00617  }

00633  void ClearFindFastArray()
00634  {
00635   ZIP_ARRAY_SIZE_TYPE uCount = m_pFindArray->GetSize();
00636   for (ZIP_ARRAY_SIZE_TYPE i = 0; i < uCount; i++)
00637    delete (*m_pFindArray)[i];
00638   m_pFindArray->RemoveAll();
00639  }

00669  int CompareElement(LPCTSTR lpszFileName, ZIP_INDEX_TYPE uIndex) const
00670  {
00671   return ((*m_pFindArray)[(ZIP_ARRAY_SIZE_TYPE)uIndex]->m_pHeader->GetFileName().*(m_pInfo->m_pCompare))(lpszFileName);
00672  }
